conbody.p: The Domain Designer is a tree-based editor which provides a complete environment to create, edit and maintain the domain models. It lets the user to define domain objects (business entities), their attributes and the relationships between them. The domain designer simplifies MML editing user experience.

section.title: Figure : The Domain Designer with the tabbed-properties view

section.p: The domain designer implements very intuitive editor features like the custom tabbed properties views which simplifies specifying inner details of the model elements, model constraints checks, validation feedbacks, label decorators, filters and providers that provide more details of the model elements.

section.title: The Plug-ins
section.p: The Domain Designer is split into a several source plugin projects.

strow.stentry: The source plugin project mdf-ecore contains the EMF meta-model, generated java implementation of the meta-model, and the classes related to the model persistence, model lookup, model repositories.

The source plugin project mdf-editor contains classes related to tree editor, its contextual menu actions, properties view pages, dialogs, domain validation, decorators, filters, various providers (label, content, sorters etc), and several extension-points.
The source plugin project mdf-custom contains classes related to domain customization and several extensions specific to customization.

The source plugin project mdf-generation contains classes and resources related to code, document and model artifact generation from the domain models. The artifacts include Java Beans, Rules, OR Mappings, Service Configurations, Service Implementations, Service delegates, XML Schemas, XLS based documentation etc.
The source plugin project mdf-validation contains classes related to model validation constraints and providers.
The source plugin project mdf-compare contains classes specific to domain-model compare extending the EMF Compare Framework.
The source plugin project mdf-integration provides classes specific to domain integration with the workbench.
The source plugin project domain-translationprovides localization support for domain model elements.
The source plugin project mdf-search provides domain model specific search functionality.
